Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
57 Savitakkaduka, Kusalattika
Savitakkaduka, Kusalattika
66.
185Savitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
186Savitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
